input_args.passage: "Testament Deliver Fresh Sound, Political Lyrics In New LP; ... | ... DVD/ CD set, called Here at The End of All Things. The DVD portion will include a full, live set shot during one of the band's gigs five ..."
input_args.claim: 'Therefore, we can deduce that "The Lord of the Rings" is the book that inspired the name of the CD/DVD "Here at the End of All Things".'
